title: vanajaa nayanuDani
sahitya:
vanaja nayanuDani valacitivO vAni manasuna dayalEdE

anupallavi

 manubaDi caritamulanu viniyunnAvu vanita svabhAvamO velayu shrI dEvarAju

caraNam

 orula bAdhalanu Orva kuNDuTayE parama dharmamani bAguga balkucu 
varaduDu Ashrita vatsaluDani pErE dharaNija lOluDu tyAgarAjArcituDu
